StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markcard_principal
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE proc_markcard_principal ( p_school_code IN VARCHAR2, p_batch_no IN DATE, p_class_code IN VARCHAR2, p_term_code IN VARCHAR2, p_principal_digital IN OUT VARCHAR2, p_principal_name IN OUT VARCHAR2 ) AS
---cursor principal CURSOR cur_school_principal ( pp_school_code VARCHAR2, pp_batch_no DATE, pp_class_code VARCHAR2, pp_term_code VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT principal_id, principal_name FROM mv_school_principal WHERE school_code = pp_school_code AND batch_no# = pp_batch_no AND class_code = pp_class_code AND term_code = pp_term_code; BEGIN ---cursor school-principal OPEN cur_school_principal( pp_school_code => p_school_code, pp_batch_no => p_batch_no, pp_class_code => p_class_code, pp_term_code => p_term_code ); FETCH cur_school_principal INTO p_principal_digital, p_principal_name; CLOSE cur_school_principal; END;
